meanings.sent1: The dissensus among the group led to a heated argument.
meanings.sent2: The dissensus between the two friends caused tension in their relationship.
meanings.sent3: The dissensus over which movie to watch resulted in a funny debate.
meanings.sent4: The dissensus in political views created a divide within the community.
meanings.sent5: The dissensus on the best flavor of ice cream made the decision difficult.

meanings.sent1: The dissensus in the meeting prevented any decisions from being made.
meanings.sent2: The dissensus among the team members delayed the project completion.
meanings.sent3: The dissensus on the dress code led to a comical fashion show.
meanings.sent4: The dissensus in negotiations left both parties at a standstill.
meanings.sent5: The dissensus on the budget allocation halted progress on the construction.
